Package org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api.security

Class SecurityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.kernel.api.security.SecurityContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecurityContext.AuthDisabled
    public class SecurityContext
extends Object
implements LoginContext
    Controls the capabilities of a KernelTransaction, including the authenticated user and authorization data. Must extend LoginContext to handle procedures creating internal transactions, periodic commit and the parallel cypher prototype.

    • Nested Class Summary

        Parameters:
        idLookup - token lookup, used to compile fine grained security verification
